p: Ayurveda, Siddha, Unani, and Homeopathy (referred to as AYUSH) are Indian medicinal systems that use natural drugs of plant, animal, and mineral origin for treatment. At present pandemic, AYUSH has recommended that the Homeopathy and Ayurveda as immune-boosters have sufficient potential to prevent and treat COVID-19. Considering the success of AYUSH systems in managing several epidemics and restoring health, AYUSH system recommends some herbs including Chyavanprash, Herbal tea, and Turmeric milk as immune boosters and has suggested some herbal formulations for treating COVID-19 [ 90, 91].
